Activities

Invited talks, Seminars and Workshop presentations

Event organised

  • Mini-symposium "Geometric Aspects of Inverse Problems: Non-smooth Regularization and Optimization": Applied Inverse Problems, Grenoble France, 8 - 12 July, 2019. Co-organised with: Clarice Poon.
  • Mini-symposium "Approaches for Fast Optimisation in Imaging and Inverse Problems": SIAM Conference on Imaging Science, Bologna Italy, 5 - 8 June, 2018. Co-organised with: Mila Nikolova and Carola Schönlieb.

Presentations

  • Trajectory of First-order Methods and Adaptive Acceleration: Workshop on Efficient Algorithms in Data Science, Learning, and Computational Physics, Tsinghua Sanya International Mathematics Forum (TSIMF), Sanya China, 12 - 16 January, 2020.
